routes.title: CounterX – Evaluate, Buy and Sell Digital Assets with Real Data
routes.description: CounterX é a plataforma moderna para compra, venda e valuation de ativos SaaS e digitais.
routes.ogTitle: CounterX – Digital Assets Marketplace with Automated Valuation
